dcterms:creator: C. Sarraute
O. Buffet
J. Hoffmann
dcterms:description: A dataset used for simulating penetration testing scenarios, framed as a Markov Decision Process (MDP) to model network configurations, available scans, and exploits.
dcterms:title: Network Attack Simulator (NAS)

dcterms:creator: C. Sarraute
O. Buffet
J. Hoffmann
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the application of Partially Observable Markov Decision Processes (POMDPs) in penetration testing, accounting for uncertainty in the attacker's knowledge.
dcterms:title: POMDPs Make Better Hackers

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: An evaluation platform for general agents, providing a framework for testing reinforcement learning algorithms in various gaming scenarios.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale hierarchical image database used for visual recognition tasks, providing a benchmark for image classification algorithms.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: G. F. Riley
T. R. Henderson
dcterms:description: A network simulator designed for modeling and simulating network protocols and applications, providing a flexible environment for testing network scenarios.
dcterms:title: NS3 Network Simulator

dcterms:creator: F. Holik
J. Horalek
O. Marik
S. Neradova
S. Zitta
dcterms:description: A framework for penetration testing that provides a rich library of known exploits and tools for security assessment.
dcterms:title: Metasploit Framework

dcterms:creator: P. Mell
K. Scarfone
S. Romanosky
dcterms:description: A standardized framework for assessing the severity of vulnerabilities in software and hardware, providing a numerical score to help prioritize remediation efforts.
dcterms:title: Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)
